item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Laurentian Bank of Canada Logo
The Laurentian Bank of Canada is a Schedule 1 bank that operates primarily in the province of Quebec, with commercial and business banking offices located in Ontario, Alberta, British Columbia, and Nova Scotia. LBC’s Institution Number is 039. It is the only bank in North America with a labour union, although recent steps have been taken to revoke the accreditation. The institution was established as the Montreal City and District Savings Bank in 1846.
You can download theLaurentian Banklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Laurentian Bank
item.description: The Laurentian Bank of Canada is a Schedule 1 bank that operates primarily in the province of Quebec, with commercial and business banking offices located in Ontario, Alberta, British Columbia, and Nova Scotia. LBC’s Institution Number is 039. It is the only bank in North America with a labour union, although recent steps have been taken to revoke the accreditation. The institution was established as the Montreal City and District Savings Bank in 1846.
